castVote(uint256,bool).notice: Juror casts vote on a dispute

createDispute(uint256,uint256,address,ad.notice: Create a new dispute (called by ProjectEscrow)

finalizeDispute(uint256).notice: Finalize dispute after voting period ends

stakeAsJuror(uint256).notice: Stake tokens to become a juror

unstake(uint256).notice: Unstake tokens (can only unstake if not in active cases)
